hub.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: the central and most important part of an area, system, activity etc, which all the other parts are connected to
hub.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: the commercial hub of the region
Birmingham is at the hub of Britainâ€™s motorway network.
hub.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: the central part of a wheel to which the axle is joined
hub.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a city or country where there is a lot of business activity because it is central in relation to other places, there are good communications etc
hub.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: The city has become a hub for Asian markets and a financial center.
hub.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: an airport with a lot of flights where people can easily change planes to go on to somewhere else
hub.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: They want to develop the airport as a European hub.
